sourcesContent:
Listado de Series

ID Nombre Canal Temporadas
{{serie.id}} {{serie.name}} {{serie.channel}} {{serie.seasons}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Serie } from '../serie'; import { SeriesService } from '../series.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-listar-series', templateUrl: './listar-series.component.html', styleUrls: ['./listar-series.component.css'] }) export class ListarSeriesComponent implements OnInit { series: Serie[] = []; averageSeasons: number = 0; constructor(private seriesService: SeriesService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.seriesService.getSeries().subscribe((data: Serie[]) => { this.series = data; this.calculateAverageSeasons(); }); } // Agrega esta función para calcular el promedio de temporadas calculateAverageSeasons(): void { let totalSeasons = 0; for (const serie of this.series) { totalSeasons += serie.seasons; } this.averageSeasons = totalSeasons / this.series.length; } }
